name: IOUserSCSIParallelInterfaceController
desc: A DriverKit provider object that manages communications with SCSI-based devices.

items.name: - UserInitializeController
items.desc: Initializes the controller in response to a call from the framework.

items.name: - UserStartController
items.desc: Starts the controller in response to a call from the framework.

items.name: - UserProcessParallelTask
items.desc: Processes a parallel task in response to a call from the framework.

items.name: - ParallelTaskCompletion
items.desc: Indicates to the system that the extension has completed an asynchronous request.

items.name: - UserInitializeTargetForID
items.desc: Initializes a target device in response to a call from the framework.

items.name: - UserCreateTargetForID
items.desc: Creates the specified target.

items.name: - UserDestroyTargetForID
items.desc: Destroys the specified target.

items.name: - UserTargetPresentForID
items.desc: Checks if a specific target is present.

items.name: - UserSetTargetProperties
items.desc: Sets properties on the target.

items.name: - UserRemoveTargetProperties
items.desc: Removes properties from a target.

items.name: - UserAbortTaskRequest
items.desc: Aborts a single task.

items.name: - UserAbortTaskSetRequest
items.desc: Aborts all tasks in a logical unit.

items.name: - UserClearACARequest
items.desc: Removes an autocontingent allegiance (ACA) attribute from a logical unitâ€™s task set.

items.name: - UserClearTaskSetRequest
items.desc: Aborts all tasks in a logical unit and clears their data.

items.name: - UserLogicalUnitResetRequest
items.desc: Resets a logical unit.

items.name: - UserTargetResetRequest
items.desc: Resets a target.

items.name: - UserReportInitiatorIdentifier
items.desc: Gets the SCSI device identifier for the host bus adapter (HBA) in response to a call from the framework.

items.name: - UserReportHighestSupportedDeviceID
items.desc: Gets the highest supported SCSI device identifier in response to a call from the framework.

items.name: - UserReportMaximumTaskCount
items.desc: Gets the maximum number of outstanding tasks the HBA can process in response to a call from the framework.

items.name: - UserDoesHBAPerformDeviceManagement
items.desc: Determines if the host bus adapter (HBA) manages devices in response to a call from the framework.

items.name: - UserReportHBAHighestLogicalUnitNumber
items.desc: Gets the highest logical unit number (LUN) in response to a call from the framework.

items.name: - UserDoesHBAPerformAutoSense
items.desc: Determines if the driver extension class automatically performs autosense and provides autosense data for each I/O in response to a call from the framework.

items.name: - UserDoesHBASupportMultiPathing
items.desc: Queries the HBA child class to determine if it supports multipathing in response to a call from the framework.

items.name: - UserDoesHBASupportSCSIParallelFeature
items.desc: Determines whether the driver extension class supports a specific feature in response to a call from the framework.

items.name: - UserMapHBAData
items.desc: Maps any host bus adapter (HBA)-specific task data in response to a call from the framework.

items.name: - UserSetHBAProperties
items.desc: Sets multiple properties for a host bus adapter.

items.name: - UserRemoveHBAProperties
items.desc: Removes properties from a host bus adapter in response to a call from the framework.

items.name: - UserReportHBAConstraints
items.desc: Reports the I/O constraints for this controller.

items.name: - UserGetDMASpecification
items.desc: Gets the controller-specific direct memory access (DMA) specification in response to a call from the framework.
